MCQ: What is the scientific study of life?
Choices: a: Physics | b: Biology | c: Chemistry | d: Geology

MCQ: Which theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Photosynthesis | c: Cellular respiration | d: Mitosis

MCQ: What is the main function of energy processing in organisms?
Choices: a: To communicate with other organisms | b: To regulate internal environments | c: To move, grow, and reproduce | d: To build cell walls

MCQ: What is the study of life at the molecular level called?
Choices: a: Ecology | b: Genetics | c: Anatomy | d: Physiology

MCQ: Which type of organisms contribute to the biodiversity of an ecosystem?
Choices: a: Plants only | b: Animals only | c: Archaea and bacteria | d: All of the above
